0.text: Innate: When Varus kills an enemy, he gains 10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) (+ 20% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 (based on level) seconds, increased to 40% (+ 40% bonus attack speed) upon scoring an enemy  champion  takedown.
0.html: Innate: When Varus kills an enemy, he gains 10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) (+ 20% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 (based on level) seconds, increased to 40% (+ 40% bonus attack speed) upon scoring an enemy champion takedown.
markedPassages: champion
takedown

0.text: Active: Varus  charges while being  slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's  range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
0.html: Active: Varus charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's  range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.

slowed

1.text: Piercing Arrow can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is cancelled and refunds  50% of the mana cost.
1.html: Piercing Arrow can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is cancelled and refunds  50% of the mana cost.
markedPassages: 50% of the mana cost

2.text: Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated  Blight stacks are   increased by 0% − 50% (based on channel time), and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0% − 67% (based on enemies hit).
2.html: Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated Blight stacks are increased by 0% − 50% (based on channel time), and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0% − 67% (based on enemies hit).
markedPassages: Blight

0.text: Passive: Varus' basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight  on-hit for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Varus'  abilities consume all Blight stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.
0.html: Passive: Varus' basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight on-hit for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Varus' abilities consume all Blight stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Blight: For each stack consumed, the target is dealt bonus magic damage. Against a  champion or epic  monster, this also  reduces his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the maximum cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against  monsters.
1.html: Blight: For each stack consumed, the target is dealt bonus magic damage. Against a champion or epic monster, this also  reduces his basic abilities' cooldowns by 12% of the maximum cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

This damage is capped at 360 against  monsters.

3.text: If Varus' does not cast  Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or he dies. Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of  Piercing Arrow's charge, and will be placed on  full cooldown even if the charge is not recast.
3.html: If Varus' does not cast Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or he dies. 4.text: Recast: Varus ends Blighted Quiver and places it on a  1-second cooldown.
4.html: Recast: Varus ends Blighted Quiver and places it on a  1-second cooldown.
markedPassages: 1-second

5.text: Blighted Quiver's active and recast can both be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
5.html: Blighted Quiver's active and recast can both be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

0.text: Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds,  slowing enemies within and inflicting them with 25%  Grievous Wounds.
1.html: The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, slowing enemies within and inflicting them with 25% Grievous Wounds.
markedPassages: slowing
Grievous Wounds

2.text: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Varus unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and  rooting them for 2 seconds. They are also  revealed and inflicted with maximum stacks of  Blight over the first 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Varus unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and rooting them for 2 seconds. They are also revealed and inflicted with maximum stacks of Blight over the first 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: rooting
revealed
Blight

1.text: Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy  champions. If a target maintains the tether for its duration, they subsequently become infected as well, receiving the same damage and effects and a new tendril will spread from them. Chain of Corruption's spread can repeat indefinitely until there are no new targets.
1.html: Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy champions. If a target maintains the tether for its duration, they subsequently become infected as well, receiving the same damage and effects and a new tendril will spread from them. Chain of Corruption's spread can repeat indefinitely until there are no new targets.
markedPassages: champions

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be caught by the tendril.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible to be caught by the tendril.
markedPassages: visible

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage, and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wrath: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Unique – Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a 0.15 second delay.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WRATH: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  900

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wind's Fury: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – WIND'S FURY: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by  critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
